# Quabu Solutions

> Quabu is an Atlassian Gold Solution Partner specialized in Digital Accelerators and enterprise digital transformation.
> Offices in Miami, FL (USA) and Barcelona, Spain. Contact: hello@quabusolutions.com

## About

Quabu helps businesses accelerate their digital transformation with pre-built, customizable solutions built on the Atlassian ecosystem. We are a certified Atlassian Gold Solution Partner and Atlassian Marketplace Partner.

- Website: https://www.quabusolutions.com
- Email: hello@quabusolutions.com
- Atlassian Marketplace: https://marketplace.atlassian.com/vendors/1220154/quabu

## Services

- **Atlassian Services**: Consultancy, implementation, licensing, audit, training and support for Jira, Confluence, and all Atlassian products.
- **Cloud Migration**: Seamless migration from Atlassian Server/Data Center to Atlassian Cloud with zero downtime.
- **Custom Development**: Custom Forge apps, REST API integrations, automations, and third-party connectors.
- **Managed Services**: 24/7 monitoring, proactive maintenance, and ongoing Atlassian environment administration.

## Digital Accelerators

Pre-built, ready-to-deploy Atlassian workflows for every business department. Deploy in days, not months.

- **Marketing Accelerator**: Campaign management, content calendars, and analytics pipelines.
- **Sales Accelerator**: Sales pipelines, CRM workflows, and deal tracking.
- **HR & People Accelerator**: Onboarding, performance reviews, and employee lifecycle management.
- **Operations Accelerator**: Process automation, project tracking, and resource management.
- **Finance Accelerator**: Budget approvals, expense tracking, and financial workflows.
- **IT & DevOps Accelerator**: Incident management, change requests, and service desk workflows.
- **Customer Service Accelerator**: Support ticketing, SLA management, and customer portals.
- **R&D Accelerator**: Product development, innovation tracking, and research workflows.

## Marketplace Apps

Quabu develops apps for the Atlassian Marketplace trusted by thousands of teams worldwide:

- **Backup Manager for Jira**: Automated backups for Jira projects and configurations.
- **Custom Templates for Jira**: Reusable issue templates and workflow templates.
- **Task Lists for Jira**: Advanced task management and checklists within Jira issues.
- **Custom Language for Jira**: Localization and language customization for Jira.

## Key Facts

- Atlassian Gold Solution Partner
- Atlassian Marketplace Partner
- Atlassian Service Management Partner
- 10+ years of Atlassian expertise
- 50+ enterprise clients across USA and Europe
- Offices: Miami, FL and Barcelona, Spain
- 3x faster deployment with Digital Accelerators vs custom development
